snippet: Gunmen kidnapped about 100 teenage girls on Tuesday from a school in northeastern Nigeria, in what officials said was a new attack by Muslim militants.
abstract: Gunmen kidnap about 100 teenage girls from a school in northeastern Nigeria, in what officials say is a new attack by Muslim militants.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen kidnapped about 100 teenage girls on Tuesday from a school in northeastern Nigeria, in what officials said was a new attack by Muslim militants.
